channel.title: Rune Mantis - Client Development Progress
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/Untitled-1-4.png[/img][/center] [code=Updates] 2/28/12 - Just went through a 699 Sprite Dump and gathered pictures for new game frame. 2/28/12 - Put together basic bar tabs. 2/29/21 - Put together a bar for the tabs for fullscreen single column 2/29/12 - Put together a bar for the tabs on smaller fullscreen or resizeable but with two colums 3/1/12 - Got the sidebar tabs to change on toggling fullscreen and fixed. Includes new sprites for tabs and the icons on the tabs. Just need to reposition the new tab icons. 3/1/12 - Put together an tab background for the fullscreen to represent the RS2 one. Pretty sure its 99% accurate. 3/1/12 - Added new sprites. Fixed a few glitches where when you logged out with the newer gameframe, it would logback in with the same gameframe instead of the fixed. 3/1/12 - Added newer orb backgrounds. 3/2/12 - Repositioned orb color backgrounds 3/2/12 - Added new orbs to incirle the compass, world map and minimap. [/code]
Some examples of What I have so far. I know this isnt how to do it, this is just what i have found so far regarding sprites. I have found more BTW.
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/exampleof1row.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/exampleoftwobars.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/fullscreen.png[/img]
At the moment I have nothing fancy to show. This is just a small project I am doing to gain more knowledge on clients. I'm not going to be some newb posting "OMFG. FULLSCREEN!!!" because its there, that had nothing to do with me. I have a few plans on what I am looking for. I am mainly doing client sided stuff and may release some of it.
PLEASE SUGGEST THINGS!
The only think I can think of is adding new gameframe and a new settings tab. IF ANYONE WHO KNOWS HOW TO MAKE INTERFACES AND WANTS TO TEACH ME HOW TO, LET ME KNOW IN A PM! WOULD GREATLY APPRECIATE IT!

item.title: Rune Mantis - Client Development Progress
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[center][/center]

2/28/12 - Just went through a 699 Sprite Dump and gathered pictures for new game frame.
2/28/12 - Put together basic bar tabs.
2/29/21 - Put together a bar for the tabs for fullscreen single column
2/29/12 - Put together a bar for the tabs on smaller fullscreen or resizeable but with two colums
3/1/12 - Got the sidebar tabs to change on toggling fullscreen and fixed. Includes new sprites for tabs and the icons on the tabs. Just need to reposition the new tab icons.
3/1/12 - Put together an tab background for the fullscreen to represent the RS2 one. Pretty sure its 99% accurate.
3/1/12 - Added new sprites. Fixed a few glitches where when you logged out with the newer gameframe, it would logback in with the same gameframe instead of the fixed.
3/1/12 - Added newer orb backgrounds.
3/2/12 - Repositioned orb color backgrounds
3/2/12 - Added new orbs to incirle the compass, world map and minimap.

Some examples of What I have so far. I know this isnt how to do it, this is just what i have found so far regarding sprites. I have found more BTW.

At the moment I have nothing fancy to show. This is just a small project I am doing to gain more knowledge on clients. I’m not going to be some newb posting “OMFG. FULLSCREEN!!!” because its there, that had nothing to do with me. I have a few plans on what I am looking for. I am mainly doing client sided stuff and may release some of it.

PLEASE SUGGEST THINGS!

The only think I can think of is adding new gameframe and a new settings tab. IF ANYONE WHO KNOWS HOW TO MAKE INTERFACES AND WANTS TO TEACH ME HOW TO, LET ME KNOW IN A PM! WOULD GREATLY APPRECIATE IT!
